autumn.lang.internals

Class SharedState

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.lang.internals.SharedState

  • public final class SharedState
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class stores the state that is shared between multiple prototype objects. This state is the method, getter, and setter handlers and the static layout.
